citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:54 AM on May
16th, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee and facility representative via the phone numbers on file,
leaving a voicemail message for the facility representative. The licensee's voicemail mailbox was full. The inspector
waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:54 AM on May 
16th, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee and facility representative via the phone numbers on file, 
leaving a voicemail message for the facility representative. The licensee's voicemail mailbox was full. The inspector 
waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
